channel.title: Ciclops on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Jaime Silvela
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Jaime Silvela, experienced software developer and system builder and CloudNativePG component owner.
